title: 10PCS Silicone Face Mask Bracket,3D Mask Bracket Inner Support Frame for More Breathing Space,Keep Fabric off Mouth,Cool Lipstick Protection Stand,Reusable&Washable and Durable
features: 【High-quality Material】- Made of food-grade silicone material, our mask holder is skin-friendly, soft and smooth, non-irritating to the skin, and no pungent smell.
【More Breathe Space】- Our mask frame can hold up the mask fabric around the mouth to create more breathing space, and prevent directly contacting the mask to reduce the risk.
【Fix Problems】- Its special design make it avoid problems such as lipstick sticks to the mask, nose pressure, and glasses fog. Mask support frame can keep the mask off face around you mouth.
【Fits Different Masks】- You can fix it on the mask you want to wear by yourself with double-sided tape, or thread to fasten the silicone frame onto the mask can make it work better.
【Package Included】- 1 pack with 5 pieces 3D mask bracket frame only, if you have any problem, please don’t be hesitate to contact us.
description: Our face mask frame will help to improve your breathing space by creating more space because the bracket can hold up the mask fabric around the mouth. So you will feel more comfortable and easier to breathe even though a face mask covers your nose.

Made of high-quality material, our support frame is very skin-friendly and you will have a more comfortable experience than the usual mask, it can make your nose feel no pressure, breathing more smoothly, breathable, and not stuffy. It is also reusable and washable.
If you have any dissatisfaction with our products, please contact us at your convenience, and we will provide you a refund or new item replacement service.
1. Let the mask hold the bracket first  2. Then put on the mask.  3. Adjust the position of the bracket to make it fit the face perfectly.
Please use warm water to clean the mask frame before use.For better work, use the double-sided tape or thread to fasten the silicone frame.
